alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued April 18 at 8:54PM MDT until April 20 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...In Colorado, Grand Valley and Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin. In Utah, Southeast Utah and Arches/Grand Flat. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley
